page.title: 06POLICE AND CRIME
page.content: We went to Strathaven Police Station and asked the police there a few questions :-1)WHAT IS THE MOST COMMON CRIME IN STRATHAVEN?------The most common crime is theft,mainly housebreaking and shoplifting. 2)IS THEFT INCREASING?-----Over the last three years there has been an increase. 3)SINCE IT BECAME COMPULSORY TO WEAR SEATBELTS HAS THERE BEEN A DECREASE IN SERIOUS ACCIDENTS?-----In Strathaven there has been a definite decrease in accidents. 4)DO YOU THINK THAT INCREASED UNEMPLOYMENT HAS LED TO AN INCREASE IN CRIME?------Yes. A survey of the public indicated that they wished to see more policemen on the beat and felt that not enough was being done to combat crime due to light sentences by courts.
